original_text: And the chief fathers of the families of the children of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of the sons of Joseph, came near, and spake before Moses, and before the princes, the chief fathers of the children of Israel:
korean_text: 요셉 자손의 종족 중 므낫세의 손자 마길의 아들 길르앗 자손 종족들의 수령들이 나아와 모세와 이스라엘 자손의 수령 된 지휘관들 앞에 말하여

sentences.original_text: And the chief fathers of the families of the children of Gilead
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 길르앗 자손의 여러 가문의 족장들이

sentences.original_text: of the families of the sons of Joseph
the chief fathers of the children of Israel:
